data.title: Internet TV Packages Cayman
data.meta_description: C3 Pure Fibre opens up the world of pure entertainment with our various TV packages. Ask about our TV add-on packages for even more viewing options.
data.text:
Fibre optic cables are made of incredibly thin strands of glass, known as optical fibres. Information (internet, TV, phone calls, etc) can travel through these fibres at the speed of light in one continuous line, without any interruption, providing super fast, reliable and secure internet services.

Contact C3 Pure Fibre through phone or email to speak to one of our customer service representatives, or visit one of our stores. Call 333-3333, email info@c3.ky or visit one of our stores

Yes, just contact us today and we will get fibre internet set up for you. Call 333-3333, email info@c3.ky or visit one of our stores.

Click on Service Area on any page to look up your street name or contact us and we will help you find the closest C3 to you. Call 333-3333, email info@c3.ky or visit one of our stores

Building out and installing the infrastructure for our fibre network takes time. We are always expanding to provide service to new areas. Check on our service area map to see if we are in your area or contact us. Call 333-3333, email info@c3.ky or visit one of our stores

We strive to get your new service up and running as soon as possible, as we understand the importance of having your TV. Contact a C3 Pure Fibre customer service representative today and to get an approximate timeframe on your service installation. Call 333-3333, email info@c3.ky or visit one of our stores

A TV package comes with one free set-top box to go with your chosen TV. If you would like cable on any another TV, you will need to get an additional set-top box for $9.95 per month, per additional TV.

Yes, we have additional TV channels curated for your viewing pleasure that you can add-on to any TV package. Our add-on packages include HBO Max, HBO Digital, FOX Premium, Spanish and Filipino. Simply call us at 333-3333, send us an email at info@c3.ky, or pop into our store to add on your favourite package.

Yes. We have DVRs (digital video recorder) available so that you never miss a show. Enjoy hundreds of hours of recorded television programming for a small charge. Call 333-3333, email info@c3.ky or visit one of our stores for more information.
